inclusion.criterion: Patients aged > 35 years, the diagnosis of both OSA and COPD.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient is 70 y/o with COPD on 2.5-3.5L O2 at baseline, OSA and obesity hypoventilation syndrome.

inclusion.criterion: OSA must have been diagnosed using an American Academy of Sleep Medicine (AASM)-protocol overnight Type I polysomnogram assessment.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient underwent AASM-protocol overnight Type I polysomnogram assessment.

inclusion.criterion: COPD must be diagnosed using American Thoracic Society (ATS)-protocol pulmonary function testing.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient's COPD was diagnosed using ATS-protocol pulmonary function testing.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have Global Obstructive Lung Disease (GOLD) stage II COPD FEV1/FVC < 70% predicted in conjunction with an FEV1 <80% predicted.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has GOLD stage II COPD with FEV1/FVC < 70% and FEV1 < 80%.

inclusion.criterion: The patient must have a > 10 pack years smoking history and a documented history of at least one exacerbation leading to treatment with systemic glucocorticoids or antibiotics or hospitalization within the previous year.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has > 10 pack years smoking history and had an exacerbation requiring hospitalization.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a diagnosis of both OSA and COPD.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has both OSA and COPD.

exclusion.criterion: Significant diseases other than COPD, i.e. disease or condition which, in the opinion of the investigator, may have put the patient at risk because of participation in the study or may have influenced either the results of the study or the patients' ability to participate in the study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a diagnosis of asthma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a life-threatening pulmonary obstruction, or a history of cystic fibrosis
exclusion.label: unknown
not_met
exclusion.evidence: Patient does not have active TB.

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a history of and/or active significant alcohol or drug abuse.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA, obesity hypoventilation syndrome, dCHF, and other comorbidities. Patient's overall health status is complex.
